important python packages:
theano
argparse
keras version 1.1.0 (keras verion 2 will not work!)
pickle
matplotlib
palettable
sklearn
scipy
numpy
statistics
(more python packages might needed to be installed)

Other algorithm need to installed
ZIFA 
SIMLR
pcaReduce
SINCERA
SNN-Cliq

Other packages:
need gprofiler to be installed at home directory (if need to run GO_analysis_gprofiler.py)
